message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY

The paper discusses Bayesian style multi-armed bandit algorithms, which are commonly used in machine learning and decision making. The paper also provides derivations and explanations for these algorithms, indicating a focus on theoretical analysis. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves information theory and decision making, which suggests possible sub-categories of cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
